name: BUDEŠ VĚCI
description:
Budeš věci (Switch Things) is an FPS anti-game about going in circles in Observatory and transforming into different things to see the world from different perspectives, You can wander around and look at the same things with eyes of various living and non-living objects and interact with the environment differently. You can guess the object you transformed in by the visuals and movement mechanics. The game has no goal, story or achievements, don't try to find it, it's pointless, you literally walk in circles.

Controls:

move - WSAD

look - mouse

grab things - E

Switch to things instantly - 1,2,3,4,5   

Made for https://itch.io/jam/queer-to-play
